description: '''Steel Panther''' is an American comedic [[glam metal]] band from [[Los Angeles]], California. Fronted by lead singer [[Michael Starr (singer)|Michael Starr]], the band formed in 2000 as Metal Shop and was also known as Metal Skool before adopting the name Steel Panther in 2008. The band is known for its profane and humorous lyrics, and for [[Parody|parodying]] the stereotypical glam metal lifestyle.
